title: Dragon Tamer Bard
body: I am not a good enough drawer to draw this but, if someone loves trolling people and is short on ideas i wanted to play adc while throwing tiny dragons at people XD. Yes i love bard adc btw {{champion:432}}

replies.body: Dragon **Trainer** Bard would be better since we already have Dragon Trainer Lulu,  and it could become a set of skins like the Dragon Slayer ones.

I love this idea but it doesn't fit very well with with Bard in my opinion but other people would probably buy this skin because this is just my opinion! Maybe this could be a support skin series lol.
